idea-plugin.name: ZÆCTOR CORE
idea-plugin.description:
Professional test automation for PyCharm. Visual DOM inspection, intelligent code generation, live recording, Page Object Model generation, and comprehensive test management.

Features:
  • DOM Inspector with smart selector generation
  • Multi-framework code generation (Python, TypeScript, JavaScript, Robot Framework)
  • Live browser recording with smart waits
  • Professional Page Object Model generator
  • Test Explorer with multi-framework support
  • Test execution and suite management
